credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
dimensions: H x Diam: 24.2 x 14 cm (9 1/2 x 5 1/2 in.)
title: Vase
description: Cast white clay body.  Ovoid body with raised neck; no foot.  Underglaze slip-decorated on front with two large unopened lotu blossoms with water leaves and single blossom with unfurled leaf and stem on side.  Blossoms are pastel pink and leave are a pale gray-green.  Background shades from a dark blue to a pale green at shoulder.  Allover clear high glaze with wide crackle.  Bottom glazed.
name: Vase
